name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Baltimore Washington Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A really nice hotel. The rooms are a good size and were neatly done. They have an average size pool that was slightly cool. The hot tub was better and there's a sauna that felt really good. The breakfast was average with pastries, muffins, cereal and hot fresh waffles. The serice was excellent.
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Best Western BWI on July 2, 2007 prior to leaving for Los Angeles early the next day.
reviews.title: Great hotel before a plane trip

reviews.text: We booked one packages where you stay one night and leave your car parked there until you return. They also take you to and pick you up from the airport with their shuttle van.
reviews.title: Fair - Not my first choice

reviews.text: The hotel was clean and the front desk staff were very knowledgable about the area.
reviews.title: Not Bad

reviews.text: The hotel has an indoor pool with a dry heat sauna as well as a jacuzzi. The only complaint about the jacuzzi was that the timer control was all the way over in the opposite corner of the pool area.
reviews.title: Very good hotel
Good value
reviews.text: This was a nice hotel. We stayed one night on our way to Washington D.C. The staff were friendly, the room was decent. The beds were double-sheeted, which was a plus. The breakfast buffet was okay, not a lot of variety, but we got there near the end. There were a lot of people there and not many places to sit. We didn't use the pool but it looked clean and was fairly large. The hotel is right next door to a steak house, but not much else within walking distance.

This hotel is nice, but getting older. They do have a very convenient shuttle service to BWI. The hotel is in a safe area and outdoor appearance/lobby area is nice. The rooms are average clean - they could use some redecorating and new TV's. The TV has cable but is a poor reception - the same with the phone - it had a lot of static. Our room was directly above the pool so it smelled like chlorine which was annoying - request AWAY from the pool. There is a nice restaurant just literally a few feet away but doesn't open until lunchtime. The clerks are helpful and the lobby has a computer work station. The breakfast had TOASTER waffles (misleading on their website) but is good with a lot of variety for a continental breakfast. The pool was clean and warm with a hot tub. Overall, its a good hotel but we'll probably look for something a little nicer for the price we paid.
reviews.title: Average Hotel
Fair for the price.
reviews.text: For the money, not a bad place to stay.

aka: Best Western Plus - Baltimore Washington Airport Hotel Elkridge
